88K.F.summary: Directa Plus Plc manufactures and sells graphene-based products for industrial and commercial applications in Italy and internationally. It operates through Textile, Environmental, and Others segments. The company offers its products under the G+ brand name. Its products are used in elastomers, textiles, composite materials, wastewater treatment, oil-spill recovery, golf balls, and foot wear. The company is based in Lomazzo, Italy.

ICF.MI.summary: Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. designs, manufactures, and markets adhesives and fabrics for automotive, footwear, leather goods, upholstered furniture, flexible, and industrial packaging markets in Italy. The company markets its products under the Industrie Chimiche Forestali, ABC - Adhesive Based Chemicals, and Durabond brands. It also exports its products to approximately 60 countries around the world. The company was formerly known as Forestali S.r.l. and changed its name to Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. in October 2006. Industrie Chimiche Forestali S.p.A. was founded in 1918 and is based in Milan, Italy.
